title: Ticket #1255: help for admins: list which knob changes require reconfig vs restart
description:
from Ian Chesal on condor-users:

Got it. Needed to a full startd restart, not just a reconfig. Now it has ceased to run my hook script when a node has a job on it.

I really wish there was a list of settings that require restarts vs. settings that just require reconfigs...

- Ian

On Tue, Mar 2, 2010 at 9:44 PM, Ian Chesal <ian.chesal@gmail.com> wrote:

I absolutely, positively do not want Condor to run my hook script if a slot is Claimed and not Idle. I've got:

FetchWorkDelay = ifThenElse(State == "Claimed", ifThenElse(Activity == "Idle", 0, 4838400), ifThenElse(State == "Unclaimed" && Activity == "Idle", 0, 1200))

I've seeded my machines with long (12 hour) sleeper jobs to test this. But I'm still seeing the Startd fire my hook script at bizarre intervals. Nothing periodic at all, it's all over the place: 5 minutes, 12 minutes, 7 minutes, 13 minutes...

How can I tell if Condor is delay the fetch work call appropriately? I've got ALL_DEBUG=D_FULLDEBUG on but the StartLog doesn't mention the delay time, just when it runs the fetch work hook for me.

- Ian

We can start small with this list, and add to it. That way it is not a monumental task. This ticket will be resolved once there is a small list started.
remarks:
2010-Mar-26 13:57:44 by smoler:
A list of knobs that require restart:

PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS_STABLE

FetchWorkDelay

DAEMON_LIST

NUM_CPUS

MAX_NUM_CPUS

PROCD_ADDRESS

NETWORK_INTERFACE

BIND_ALL_INTERFACES

PRIVSEP_ENABLED
